roleset.name: tell or spread rumors

example.name: infinitival Arg1
example.text: Pennzoil is rumored to be accumulating a stake in Chevron in order to push for a revamping of the company...
example.arg: to be accumulating a stake in Chevron in order to push for a revamping of the company...

example.name: small clause
example.text: Nashua Corp, rumored a potential takeover target for six months, said that a Dutch company has sought U.S. approval to buy up to 25% of Nashua's shares.
example.arg: Corp, rumored a potential takeover target

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Uh He 's uh t- rumored to be considered for the Hall of Fame /.
example.arg: to be considered for the Hall of Fame

example.name: just utterance
example.text: It has long been rumored that Ocean Drilling would sell the unit to concentrate on its core oil and gas business.
example.arg: Ocean Drilling would sell the unit to concentrate on its core oil and gas business.

example.name: arg 1
example.text: that Marios Monti could become the next prime minister of Italy.
example.arg: that Marios Monti could become the next prime minister of Italy.

roleset.note: RUMOR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rumor' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. FN class unattributed_information. Revised by Olga. Updated 2/13 by Katie. (from rumor.01-v)
RUMOR-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to rumor.01-v. No VN class. FN class unattributed_information. Framed by Katie. (from rumor.01-n)
Ignore adjectival usages like "a rumored target". (from rumor.01-v)
